Uses of Interface
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging.FlowLogger

  • Packages that use FlowLogger 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation
    Classes related to the compilation of Flows into FlowExecutions.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
    Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.logging
    Provides a default FlowLogger which prints messages to the console.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors
    Provides the basic FlowVisitor implementation needed to execute a Flow, together with the Visitors public entry point for obtaining and composing Visitors.

    • Uses of FlowLogger in com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation

      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation with parameters of type FlowLogger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Compilers.Builder<C> Compilers.Builder.loggingTo(FlowLogger logger)
      Specifies that FlowExecutions compiled by the constructed compiler will log messages to the provided FlowLogger.

    • Uses of FlowLogger in com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows

    • Uses of FlowLogger in com.codepoetics.fluvius.logging

    • Uses of FlowLogger in com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors

      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors with parameters of type FlowLogger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FlowVisitor<Action> Visitors.logging(FlowVisitor<Action> wrapped, FlowLogger logger)
      Wrap a FlowVisitor which constructs an Action which can be executed, decorating it with logging behaviour.
